column4: Can I see in the log of squidGuard what site the user tried to access when denied ?
that some kind of filtering proxy at home? then yse
well that is a proxy server, so yeah it'll see it
i can see only the redirect page from squidGuard, and i see it on /var/log/squid/access.log
i dont know anything about squidGuard or what you mean by a redirect page. If you run a proxy server on your network like squid and its set to log requests then you can view whatever it is set to log
